Articles.Content: <figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="https://41.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_np0zcwI0am1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><figure data-url="https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DgkKAkmV3zTA" data-orig-height="304" data-orig-width="540" data-provider="youtube" class="tmblr-embed tmblr-full"><iframe id="youtube_iframe" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gkKAkmV3zTA?feature=oembed&enablejsapi=1&origin=https://safe.txmblr.com&wmode=opaque" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="304" width="540"></iframe></figure><p>Skye Storme is a YouTuber who is known for producing gameplay series and tutorials for all sorts of simulation games, and he decided to tackle Kerbal Space Program in a career mode series on his channel. <br/></p><p>Follow Skye as he starts with the very basics of the game and works his way over all the hurdles the game throws at him.<br/></p>

Thanks for the link!

What dialect does he speak? I'm hearing "Kerbal Spice Program" all the time. ^^
